thread.title: Geoffrey Long

author: Geoffrey Long
title: Geoffrey Long
text: Like anything to do with money one thinks 'is this genuine" so I sent on the first transaction just a small sum of money... It arrived to my destination bank in one day.... Brilliant so I then transferred a larger amount again brilliant Totally trustworthy way of transferring money that banks cannot compete with.... My friend recommended this site to me and I can certainly recommend to others....
